lead_paragraph: In a vast match-fixing case, prosecutors in Changwon have indicted 55 soccer players, almost one out of every 10 professional players in the country.
snippet: In a vast match-fixing case, prosecutors in Changwon have indicted 55 soccer players, almost one out of every 10 professional players in the country.
